Value: American Realty Investors Inc is a real estate company. The company acquires, develops, and owns income-producing residential and commercial real estate properties. Its segment involves the Residential segment and the Commercial segment. The residential segment is engaged in the acquisition, development, ownership, and management of multifamily properties and the Commercial segment is engaged in the acquisition, ownership, and management of commercial real estate properties. Its holdings include apartments, office buildings, retail centers, and parcels of land.
